gate_name: Sprint 1 Quality Gate: Core Models Ready
criteria: All master data models defined; >80% unit test coverage on new models; RBAC security groups created.
success_metrics: All master data CRUD operations are functional for Admin role.

gate_name: Sprint 4 Quality Gate: Driver Portal MVP Ready
criteria: Driver E2E workflow (Login -> Start Trip -> POD) is functional on mobile viewport; All ACs met; No critical bugs.
success_metrics: Successful completion of the main driver workflow without errors.

gate_name: Sprint 7 Quality Gate: E-Invoicing Sandbox Certified
criteria: Successful end-to-end e-invoice generation against the live GSP sandbox; Resilient error handling (sync/async) demonstrated; PDF output is compliant.
success_metrics: 100% success rate for generating test invoices in the sandbox environment.

criteria: Staging environment is fully provisioned via Terraform; EKS cluster is stable and accessible; A sample application can be deployed and exposed.
success_metrics: Successful `terraform apply` and deployment of a health-check application.

criteria: All 'Must Have' stories are complete and tested; Data migration dry-run is successful and validated; User training materials are ready; No critical open bugs.
bypass_criteria: Explicit sign-off on accepted risks from project sponsor.
